mapper.select: select from tb_message where id in ( select max(id) from tb_message where from_id != 0 and (from_id = #{userId} or to_id = #{userId}) group by conversation_id ) order by id desc limit #{page}, #{limit}
select count(m.maxid) from ( select max(id) as maxid from tb_message where from_id != 0 and (from_id = #{userId} or to_id = #{userId}) group by conversation_id ) as m
